blog.description: A collection of fanfiction to read, recipes to eat, and craft projects to try.

title: Oh God Not Again!
excerpt: So maybe everything didn't work out perfectly for Harry. Still, most of his friends survived, he'd gotten married, and was about to become a father. If only he'd have stayed away from the Veil, he wouldn't have had to go back and do everything AGAIN.

summary: “Uagadou is the Ugandan wizarding school, located in the Mountains of the Moon in western Uganda. It is the largest of the...
caption:
“Uagadou is the Ugandan wizarding school, located in the Mountains of the Moon in western Uganda. It is the largest of the eleven wizarding schools, accepting students from all over Africa.”

Moodboard of the Ugandan wizarding school, Uagadou and the students who attend it.

Requested by: anon.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: gryffindortrombonist
blog.title: Fandom what?
blog.description: Just some random stuff about fandoms I like. Very specific, isn't it?

summary: So I've been thinking. We all know James and Lily had matching patronuses. But who was the first? The way I think about it is...
body: So I’ve been thinking. We all know James and Lily had matching patronuses. But who was the first? The way I think about it is that James’ patronus is a deer because he IS a deer in his animagus form. And I’m sure he became an animagus way before Lily mannaged to produce a corporeal patronus and long before she came to love James. So I think that Lily has a doe patronus becase James has a deer patronus. So her patronus adapted to his, not the other way round. And that would also mean that Snape basicaly has a doe patronus because of James. Imagine how he’d be pissed of if he knew.

reblog.comment: So I’ve been thinking. We all know James and Lily had matching patronuses. But who was the first? The way I think about it is that James’ patronus is a deer because he IS a deer in his animagus form. And I’m sure he became an animagus way before Lily mannaged to produce a corporeal patronus and long before she came to love James. So I think that Lily has a doe patronus becase James has a deer patronus. So her patronus adapted to his, not the other way round. And that would also mean that Snape basicaly has a doe patronus because of James. Imagine how he’d be pissed of if he knew.

The way I think about it is that James’ patronus is a deer because he IS a deer in his animagus form. And I’m sure he became an animagus way before Lily mannaged to produce a corporeal patronus and long before she came to love James. So I think that Lily has a doe patronus becase James has a deer patronus. So her patronus adapted to his, not the other way round. And that would also mean that Snape basicaly has a doe patronus because of James. Imagine how he’d be pissed of if he knew.

The way I think about it is that James’ patronus is a deer because he IS a deer in his animagus form. And I’m sure he became an animagus way before Lily mannaged to produce a corporeal patronus and long before she came to love James. So I think that Lily has a doe patronus becase James has a deer patronus. So her patronus adapted to his, not the other way round. And that would also mean that Snape basicaly has a doe patronus because of James. Imagine how he’d be pissed of if he knew.

summary: Ron Weasley would have done much better without magic. His two passions in life were quidditch and chess. He was pretty shit at...
body: Ron Weasley would have done much better without magic. His two passions in life were quidditch and chess. He was pretty shit at quidditch, but he was great at chess. Without magic, he could probably practice and become a Grandmaster.

tags: sorry i'm so bad at drawing guys :c but i hope you enjoy..
summary: Perhaps Hogwarts’ best-kept secret is that Professor Snape has an apiary where he keeps bees.  Honey has many uses in magic,...
caption:
Perhaps Hogwarts’ best-kept secret is that Professor Snape has an apiary where he keeps bees. 

Honey has many uses in magic, especially in rituals and potions designed to invoke healing, happiness, courage, and protection. 

Severus also finds the bees themselves to be rather calming, and always looks forward to spending some time surrounded by their gentle buzz on a quiet afternoon. It’s where he steals a few rare moments of peace.
